sans être touché par les ballons de soda.

translation.en: without getting hit by their Kool-Aid balloons.
translation.fr:
Il faut capturer le drapeau adverse
sans être touché par les ballons de soda.

translation.en: If you get Kablowey-ed, you're eliminated.
translation.fr: Qui se fait Kablowey est éliminé.

translation.en: When one team has all the flags, game's over.
translation.fr:
La capture des drapeaux
sonne la fin du jeu.

translation.en: Now, let's play some Kablowey!
-[Allison] Big Blue! Big Blue! -[all] What? What?
-[Allison] Break it down. -[all] What?
Okay.
That's enough of that. That's a little awkward for everyone.
translation.fr:
Ça suffit.
C'est gênant pour tout le monde.

translation.en: All right, guys, here we go.
translation.fr: Allez, tout le monde, on y va.

translation.en: Get your team's flag and protect it like it's tots!
translation.fr: Protégez votre drapeau comme vos frites !

translation.en: On the count of three, I want you to charge!
Three, two…
Wait. No, I screwed that up. Sorry.
One, two…
-three! -[screaming]
Mom's our strongest enemy.
Let's go get her!
Don't worry about red. My husband's on defense.
translation.fr:
Oubliez les rouges.
Mon mari est en défense.

translation.en: Don't worry about green. Katie's smart. She's gonna go after her dad. Run!
translation.fr:
Oubliez les verts. Katie est futée.
Elle attaquera son père.

translation.en: Okay, guys. Okay, just… Defense is the key. Okay?
translation.fr: Bien. La défense est la clé. D'accord ?

translation.en: Wait out here. Let them eliminate each other. I know what I'm doing.
translation.fr:
Attendons. Laissons-les s’éliminer.
Je sais ce que je fais.

translation.en: Go, go! Red team. Red team. My dad's team first!
translation.fr: Allez ! Équipe rouge. Mon père d'abord !

translation.en: This is gonna be easy.
You with the hair thing, outta here!
You in the headband, you're out!
The other headband. [whistles]
-Should we take a selfie? -Yeah, sure.
translation.fr:
- On se fait une photo ?
- Oui.

translation.en: -Sweet. -Tag me on Insta, 'kay?
-One, two, three. Insatiable Island! -Yeah!
translation.fr:
- Un, deux, trois. Insatiable Island !
- Oui !

translation.en: Red team, what are you doing? It's a bloodbath!
translation.fr: Les rouges, c'est quoi ce bain de sang ?

translation.en: Half your team is eliminated!
translation.fr: La moitié de l'équipe est éliminée !

translation.en: Hold on. Change of strategy. Run for your life. Billy, get out of here!
translation.fr:
Changement de stratégie.
Sauve qui peut ! Courez !

translation.en: I love the smell of Kool-Aid in the morning.
translation.fr: J'adore l'odeur du soda de bon matin.

translation.en: [Allison] Wait a minute. We're taking too many losses!
translation.fr: Attendez, on a trop de pertes !

translation.en: [whistles] You're out!
Too many casualties! Go back! Fall back!
Fall back, team!
New strategy. Ma'am. Hi, my name's Eric.
translation.fr:
- On change de stratégie.
- Madame, je m'appelle Eric.

translation.en: -I'm here to make muscles, not friends. -I'm more shredded. Check this out.
translation.fr:
- Je suis là pour les muscles.
- Je suis encore plus costaud.

translation.en: I have a very relatable body. It's great for TV.
translation.fr: J'ai un corps parfait pour la télé.

translation.en: For TV. Insatiable Island. Put your clothes on.
We're getting killed. I need that bag.
translation.fr: On se fait tuer. Donne-moi le sac.

translation.en: Load me up with ammo!
-Get her ammo! -Bring it!
Blue, who wiped your bottoms when you were babies?
translation.fr:
Qui essuyait vos fesses
quand vous étiez bébés ?

translation.en: -My mom! -Our moms!
-Who tied your shoes when you were babies? -Our moms!
translation.fr: Qui faisait vos lacets ? Nos mères !

translation.en: Fight for your mom!
-Go, Blue! -Go, Blue!
Nando, look out!
Nice job, Commander Ellie.
Yay!
You're out!
Go!
Do you see them?
Destroy my beautiful children!
You are going down!
[Katie] Oh, this is bad.
You wanted to make me a warrior?
I'm a warrior!
Listen, I think we need to team up to take her out.
Deal.
Is that fair?
All's fair in love and Kablowey.
translation.fr: Tout est permis en amour et au Kablowey.

translation.en: Go for it.
That was perfect. It's messing her up.
translation.fr:
- C'était parfait. Elle est perdue.
- Oui.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Are you playing dirty, Nando?
translation.fr:
- C'était parfait. Elle est perdue.
- Oui. Tu fais des crasses, Nando ?

translation.en: [Nando] I don't see her. Where is she?
translation.fr: Je la vois pas. Elle est où ?

translation.en: Do you see which way she went?
[Nando] No, I didn't. Let's go.
Mom!
Yeah!
[coach] Oh wow! You got Kablowey-ed.
-Ah! -[coach] Ha-ha! You're done!
Mrs. Torres got the red flag!
translation.fr: Mme Torres a le drapeau rouge !

translation.en: If she gets the green flag, she wins!
translation.fr: Si elle a le drapeau vert, elle gagne !

translation.en: -How'd you let that happen? -What?
Hey, Brian, can I use your phone for a sec?
translation.fr: Brian, je peux utiliser ton téléphone ?

translation.en: I just gotta deal with a work thing.
Will you put in a good word with your wife?
translation.fr: Tu me recommanderas à ta femme ?

translation.en: Sure.
Wait. Hold up. Hold up.
Mom, come on. It's over. You don't even have any balloons left.
translation.fr:
Maman, allons.
C'est fini. Tu n'as plus de ballons.

translation.en: [in Spanish] Then why is there fear in your eyes, daughter?
translation.fr:
Alors pourquoi
je lis la peur dans tes yeux ?

translation.en: [in Spanish] No, no, you have more fear.
translation.fr: Non, tu as plus peur que moi.

translation.en: Tú.
No. ¡Tú!
-¡Tú! -¡Tú!
-[screams] -Wait!
That's my mom! That's my mom!
Whoo! We did it!
[in Spanish] Blue forever!
[in English] Yeah!
We shipped the nano-cams? We don't have clearance yet.
translation.fr:
Les nano caméras ? Envoyées ?
On n'a pas l'autorisation.

translation.en: Tell Alan to issue a recall.
-[Ellie] Daddy? -Honey.
-Were you talking on a phone? -No. Phone? No, no.
translation.fr:
- Tu es au téléphone ?
- Au téléphone ? Non.

translation.en: I was just out here looking at… Taking in the nature. I love nature.
translation.fr:
J'étais en train d'observer la nature.
J'adore la nature.

translation.en: -Well, it looked like you were. -Nope, I wasn't.
-No. -Daddy, do you hear that?
-What? -It must be coming from that bush.
translation.fr:
- Quoi ?
- Ça doit venir de ce buisson.

translation.en: Oh, she fell out of her nest.
translation.fr: Elle est tombée de son nid.

translation.en: Yeah.
We have to put her back.
-What? -I thought you loved nature.
translation.fr:
- Quoi ?
- Je croyais que tu aimais la nature.

translation.en: Yeah, honey, but it's a very tall tree.
translation.fr: Oui, mais cet arbre est très grand.

translation.en: If you help the birdie, Daddy,
I won't tell anyone I saw you talking on a phone.
translation.fr: je ne dirai à personne que tu téléphonais.

translation.en: Wait, wait. Ah. [grunts]
[Ellie] Come on, Daddy! Hurry up!
Oh, they're a family again, honey.
translation.fr: La famille est à nouveau réunie.

translation.en: Yay, Daddy!
It was actually a good idea, honey. Thank you.
translation.fr: C'était une bonne idée, ma chérie. Merci.

translation.en: [screams] What's this?
She thinks you're stealing her babies!
translation.fr: Elle croit que tu voles ses bébés.

translation.en: We were just trying to help!
Allison, baby!
Allison!
-[Ellie] Come down, Daddy! -I'm coming down, honey!
Ooh. You okay, Daddy?
Yeah, honey.
I'm okay. I'm okay. I'm okay.
I'm okay.
Oh my God! Stop!
Stop! Call your mom!
See? I'm not always a fun killer.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas que rabat-joie.

translation.en: Well, not today you aren't.
Mom, there's no way you'll make it through the day.
translation.fr: Tu ne tiendras jamais toute la journée.

translation.en: -I'm still saying yes, aren't I? -[Carlos] Call 911!
translation.fr: Je dis encore oui. Appelle les secours !

translation.en: -Allison! -Is that Dad?
Yup, that's him.
Your brother's taking you to get dry ice, right?
translation.fr:
Ton frère t'emmène prendre
la glace carbonique ?

translation.en: We're good. By the way, so many people are coming tonight.
translation.fr:
Oui.
Au fait, plein de gens vont venir ce soir.

translation.en: It's gonna be awesome.
[Nando] Fantastic.
Are you sure you need that much baking soda?
translation.fr: Il te faut tout ce bicarbonate ?

translation.en: Yeah, it's a better catalyst.
Trust me. I'm an expert on catalysts now.
translation.fr: Crois-moi. Je suis expert en catalyseurs.

translation.en: -Allison! Call 911! -I'll have to call you right back.
translation.fr:
- Allison, appelle les secours !
- Je te rappelle.

translation.en: Call 911!
We need a doctor, stat! There's been a horrific bird attack.
translation.fr:
Il nous faut un médecin !
C'est une terrible attaque d'oiseaux.

translation.en: What? Do I have rabies?
No, this hospital sucks, so I exaggerated a little to goose 'em. No pun intended.
translation.fr:
C'est pour qu'ils se bougent,
ils bâillent aux corneilles. Sans jeu de mots.

translation.en: -She's kidding. You're kidding, right? -Sure.
translation.fr: Elle plaisante, pas vrai ? Bien sûr.

translation.en: Here's a waiting room. -Katie, you are in charge. -Okay.
translation.fr:
La salle d'attente.
Katie, tu es responsable.

translation.en: Everybody stay with her, so I can find you later.
translation.fr:
Restez avec elle,
je vous retrouve plus tard.

translation.en: -Hurry up! Hurry up! Hurry up! -Stay. It's okay.
translation.fr:
- Vite !
- Restez ici. Tout va bien.

translation.en: Okay, Mr. Torres, you can relax.
translation.fr: M. Torres, vous pouvez vous détendre.

translation.en: The scratches are superficial. You'll be fine.
translation.fr:
Les égratignures sont superficielles.
Tout ira bien.

translation.en: Oh good. So no concussion, no rabies, no bruises? He's good to go?
translation.fr:
Donc ni commotion, ni rage,
ni contusion, il peut s'en aller ?

translation.en: He's in the clear.
-I'll send in a nurse to discharge you. -Thank you.
translation.fr:
- Une infirmière vous fera sortir.
- Merci.

translation.en: -You're okay. That's great. -Yeah.
I will get the kids, and you take your time.
translation.fr:
Je vais chercher les petits,
prends ton temps.

translation.en: Honey, I hate to be a party pooper, but my body's done.
translation.fr: Désolé d'être rabat-joie, mais je suis rincé.

translation.en: Can we finish this another day, please?
translation.fr: On peut finir un autre jour ?

translation.en: Really?
Yeah.
Yeah, I guess if you're not feeling well, of course we'll go home.
translation.fr:
- Si tu te sens mal, on va rentrer.
- Merci.

translation.en: Maybe I'll pop by the office, then go home and crash.
translation.fr:
Je passerai au bureau, - puis j'irai me coucher.
- Comment ?

translation.en: -Sorry. What'd you say? -Hm?
Maybe I'll pop by the office.
So you don't feel well enough to finish this day for our family,
translation.fr:
Tu ne te sens pas assez bien
pour finir cette journée en famille,

translation.en: but you do feel well enough to pop by the office.
translation.fr: mais assez bien pour passer au bureau.

translation.en: It's a little crisis that happened this morning.
translation.fr: Il y a eu un petit problème ce matin.

translation.en: Carlos, you want to cancel this day, that's your choice,
translation.fr:
Carlos, si tu veux annuler cette journée,
c'est ton choix,

translation.en: but you're telling the kids. [in Spanish] It's your turn to be the bad guy.
translation.fr:
mais tu le diras aux enfants.
À ton tour d'être le méchant.

translation.en: Oh, Mrs. T. Hey, get this.
I told Karen I'd give her a Yes Day, and she doesn't even want it.
translation.fr:
J'ai proposé un Yes Day à Karen
et elle n'en veut même pas.

translation.en: We have an ambulance with a siren.
translation.fr: On a une ambulance avec une sirène.

translation.en: Think of the possibilities.
Grow up, Jean. Seriously.
How about you lighten up, Karen?
Take a chill pill.
Are you okay?
Yeah, I… I just got into a fight with my husband.
translation.fr:
Oui.
Je viens de me disputer avec mon mari.

translation.en: Ah, and you want me to beat him up? No, nothing like that.
translation.fr:
- Vous voulez que je le frappe ?
- Non. Pas du tout.

translation.en: [Jean] Give him a wedgie?
translation.fr:
- Que je tire son slip ?
- Non.

translation.en: No, no. It's just that today was the first day in, like, a year
translation.fr:
- Que je tire son slip ?
- Non. Non, simplement, c'était le premier jour depuis un an

translation.en: where I felt like we were really in it together.
translation.fr:
que j'avais l'impression
d'être vraiment ensemble.

translation.en: -[Jean] Yeah. -And then he just had to go and be a wuss.
translation.fr:
- Oui.
- Et il a fallu qu'il joue les mauviettes.

translation.en: Sounds like Karen.
She's mad because I took our life savings and bought a fleet of ambulances.
translation.fr:
Elle est fâchée
parce que j'ai mis nos économies dans une flotte d'ambulances,

translation.en: I barely know how to drive this one.
translation.fr: alors que je sais à peine conduire.

translation.en: But you can't force people to change.
translation.fr: On peut pas changer les gens.

translation.en: You gotta do what works for you,
translation.fr: Faites ce qui est bon pour vous,

translation.en: and he can either join the party, or it's his loss. You know?
translation.fr:
il peut se joindre à vous,
sinon, tant pis pour lui.

translation.en: That's so true.
Hey, guys.
Honey, can I talk to you for a second?
translation.fr: Je peux te parler une seconde ?

translation.en: Yeah.
Look, I… I feel real bad.
I don't want to be the spoiler here.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas gâcher la fête.

translation.en: Well, don't feel bad. You are not the spoiler. You do you.
translation.fr:
Ne culpabilise pas.
Tu ne gâcheras rien. Fais comme tu veux.

translation.en: You can either come to this party or not.
translation.fr: Tu peux te joindre à la fête, ou pas.

translation.en: Okay?
Hey guys, let me see what you got. Big ask number four. Let me see.
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui reste ? Quatrième requête. Faites voir.

translation.en: Okay, number four. Putts N' Stuff.
translation.fr: Bien, en quatre, le parc de jeux.

translation.en: That'd be very cool. We'd have a great time.
But it does not compare
to Magic Mountain!
-What? -Whoo!
But wait. What about the distance rule?
translation.fr: Et la règle de la distance ?

translation.en: I've decided to make an exception.
translation.fr: J'ai décidé de faire une exception.

translation.en: And your dad has something he wants to say.
translation.fr: Et votre père a quelque chose à dire.

translation.en: Go ahead, Dad.
Well, guys, I'm feeling, um…
I'm… I'm feeling a little…
I'm feeling a little bit sick.
translation.fr: Je me sens un peu malade.

translation.en: You're sick?
Are you going home?
I think I might be coming down with Magic Mountain fever!
translation.fr:
Je crois que je dois avoir
la fièvre de Magic Mountain !

translation.en: -But how are we gonna get there? -Yeah.
translation.fr:
- Comment on va y aller ?
- Oui.

translation.en: Because the SUV is at the Kablowey field, and even with traffic, it'll take forever.
translation.fr:
La voiture est au terrain de Kablowey,
ça va prendre une éternité.

translation.en: Uh, duh. It's Yes Day!
Are we ready for some roller coaster madness?
translation.fr:
Prêts pour des montagnes russes
de dingue ?

translation.en: -Yes! -Yeah!
Just so we're clear, if an emergency comes in,
translation.fr: Que ce soit clair, s'il y a une urgence,

translation.en: I gotta leave you on the side of the road.
translation.fr: je vous laisse sur le bas-côté.

translation.en: -What if we're the emergency? -Oh God.
translation.fr:
- Et si on était l'urgence ?
- Bon sang.

translation.en: [chuckles] Good one.
[Jean] Oh boy. Hold on.
All right, you guys can make fun of me if you want, but I brought clean clothes.
translation.fr:
Moquez-vous si vous voulez,
mais j'ai des vêtements propres.

translation.en: -Oh my gosh! -Just in case!
-Thank you so much, Mom. -That is a nice mom.
translation.fr:
- Merci.
- Ça, c'est une gentille maman.

translation.en: I know you hate when I dress you. I took a stab.
translation.fr:
Tu n'aimes pas que je t'habille,
mais j'ai tenté.

translation.en: Beats smelling like Kool-Aid, so…
translation.fr: C'est mieux que l'odeur de soda.

translation.en: It's Magic Mountain, baby!
[Carlos] Eyes on the road, please.
[Jean] Got it. My bad.
[Jean] Attention, park visitors.
The Torres family is here for this Yes Day,
translation.fr: la famille Torres débarque pour son Yes Day.

translation.en: and I want you to say yes and you to say yes. That is right.
translation.fr:
Et je veux vous entendre dire oui.
Exactement.

translation.en: It's all about those yeses, so get ready for some fun!
translation.fr:
L'important, c'est de dire oui,
alors préparez-vous à vous amuser !

translation.en: Okay, guys. Can someone bring me a snack?
translation.fr:
Bien.
Quelqu'un peut m'apporter un en-cas ?

translation.en: You gotta say yes.
No, no, no, no, no, no, no.
Why did I say yes to this, Katie? [screams]
Okay.
-Great. There you go, honey. -Thank you.
It's really nice to get out of the house, with everyone.
translation.fr:
C'est sympa
de faire une sortie tous ensemble.

translation.en: And we have to do it more 'cause you are growing up.
translation.fr:
Il faut en faire plus
parce que tu grandis.

translation.en: We have to take advantage.
I'm gonna get cotton candy. You want some?
translation.fr:
Je vais prendre une barbe à papa.
Tu en veux ?

translation.en: No. Thanks, honey.
-Oh, hey, Katie. Your… Your… -[chimes]
Great.
I need you to text Layla right away
that her cousin isn't taking you to Fleekfest. Your mother is.
translation.fr:
que ta mère t'emmène au Fleek Fest,
pas sa cousine.

translation.en: What?
-Stay here with your sister. Okay? -Okay.
translation.fr:
- Reste avec ta sœur. D'accord ?
- Oui.

translation.en: She's trying to hook you up with some older guys.
translation.fr:
Elle veut vous présenter
des mecs plus âgés.

translation.en: -Why were you checking my phone? -You left it there.
translation.fr:
- Tu regardais mon portable ?
- Tu l'as laissé là.

translation.en: You're overreacting because I can't control what Layla sends.
translation.fr:
Tu exagères.
Je ne contrôle pas ce que Layla envoie.

translation.en: She was responding to a text you sent. "Guys at my school are so boring."
translation.fr:
Elle répondait à ton message.
"Les mecs de mon collège sont ennuyeux."

translation.en: You were snooping.
Once I saw the picture, yeah, I opened your phone.
translation.fr: J'ai regardé après avoir vu la photo.

translation.en: Dad, can you please back me up here?
I know you want your independence. I get that I'm the bummer,
translation.fr:
Tu veux ton autonomie
et je suis la rabat-joie.

translation.en: but let me be clear, Katie.
If I don't take you to the concert tonight, you aren't going.
translation.fr:
Si je ne t'emmène pas
au concert, tu n'iras pas.

translation.en: -I'm done with Yes Day. I'm done. -Oh, well, you're grounded.
translation.fr:
- J'en ai assez du Yes Day.
- Tu es punie.

translation.en: I can't believe I let you fool me into thinking you actually changed.
translation.fr:
Et dire que j'ai pu croire
que tu avais changé.

translation.en: You really don't trust me.
It isn't about trust. It's about being your parent.
translation.fr:
Il ne s'agit pas de confiance.
Je suis ta mère.

translation.en: Please, give me a break.
What's happening is I don't need you anymore, and you can't handle it.
translation.fr:
Je n'ai plus besoin de toi
et tu ne supportes pas ça.

translation.en: [Carlos, in Spanish] Katerina.
Enough.
Take your siblings to the carousel.
[in English] Go now.
[Katie] Guys, come on.
-[Nando] Where are we going? -[Katie] Carousel.
[Nando] This is the best day ever!
-Yay! -Yay!
-Yay! -Yay!
Don't you guys get it?
Mom and Dad are just using this day to take control of us.
translation.fr:
Ils profitent de cette journée
pour nous contrôler.

translation.en: They think by giving us a Yes Day, we'll do what they want for the rest of our lives.
translation.fr:
Ils pensent qu'avec un Yes Day,
on fera ce qu'ils veulent pour toujours.

translation.en: Nuh-uh.
Yeah, nuh-uh.
It's all a big con.
If today's just a big con, I hope I get conned for the rest of my life.
translation.fr:
Si c'est le cas,
je veux me faire arnaquer toute ma vie.

translation.en: Yeah. Me too.
Cardinal rule. I shouldn't have looked at her phone. No wonder she was mad.
translation.fr:
On n'a pas à regarder son portable.
Pas étonnant qu'elle se fâche.

translation.en: But it was right there, and there was a picture of a boy.
translation.fr:
Il était là.
Il y avait un garçon en photo.

translation.en: Ugh, I hate when she hates me.
translation.fr: Je déteste quand elle me déteste.

translation.en: She doesn't hate you. She's just individuating.
translation.fr:
Elle ne te déteste pas.
Elle veut s'émanciper.

translation.en: Individuating? It's annoying.
I just hope she understands that it all comes from a place of love.
translation.fr:
J'espère qu'elle sait
que je le fais par amour.

translation.en: -I know. -Don't you?
She's just our little girl.
She's not that little.
Look at that gorilla.
It looks like the one Katie used to walk around with.
translation.fr:
On dirait
celui avec lequel Katie se promenait.

translation.en: She called him "Mr. Golilla."
[Carlos] Oh yeah, I remember it got really filthy.
translation.fr: Je me souviens qu'il était très sale.

translation.en: Well, yeah, it had its own car seat.
translation.fr: Oui, il avait son propre siège auto.

translation.en: We took it everywhere, and she was so cute with her pigtails
translation.fr:
On l'emmenait partout.
Elle était si mignonne avec ses couettes,

translation.en: and her overalls and a heart on the pocket.
translation.fr: sa salopette et son cœur sur la poche.

translation.en: Yeah.
Back when she loved me and was my little buddy.
I know.
-What do you say? You wanna play? -No, it's fine. Thank you.
translation.fr: Vous voulez jouer ? Non, c'est bon. Merci.

translation.en: Carlos, I wanna play. I'm gonna win Katie that gorilla.
translation.fr:
Je veux jouer
et gagner ce gorille pour Katie.

translation.en: -Then she won't be mean to me. -You sure?
translation.fr:
- Elle ne m'en voudra plus.
- Tu es sûre ?

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
I would like to win that, please.
translation.fr: Je veux gagner ça, s'il vous plaît.

translation.en: You'll have to beat this nice lady.
Oh, okay. Hi. How are you?
I need to win this pink gorilla for my daughter, Katie. We're in a fight.
translation.fr:
Je dois gagner ce gorille pour ma fille.
On s'est disputées.

translation.en: [scoffs] What if… What if I want to win that gorilla?
translation.fr: Et si je veux gagner ce gorille ?

translation.en: I already have the blue and brown gorillas.
translation.fr: J'ai déjà le bleu et le marron.

translation.en: Now I need a pink one.

translation.fr:
Je suis désolée,
et j'espère que ce n'est pas déplacé…

translation.en: I need you to hook me up.
It doesn't look that bad.
translation.fr: Ça n'a pas l'air si grave.

translation.en: -Thanks for the ride, officer. -[officer] Okay.
translation.fr:
- Merci pour la balade.
- Au revoir.

translation.en: Nando?
Ellie! What's going on?
Nando!
This party's over!
Stop!
-Stop! -[Nando] Dad!
[shouting] I said stop!
Yay, Daddy!
Kids… [heavy breathing]
…this is my house, and I'm telling you the party's over.
translation.fr:
C'est ma maison.
Je vous dis que la fête est finie.

translation.en: Okay? Where do you think you're going?
I said the party's over, but the cleanup starts now!
translation.fr:
La fête est finie,
maintenant, on nettoie !

translation.en: Start to clean. Now! Gather all the foam! Take it to the backyard.
translation.fr:
Nettoyez maintenant !
Sortez la mousse dans le jardin.

translation.en: Come on. Come on, kids.
Go, go, go! Ellie, get off the table, please, my love.
translation.fr: Allez ! Ellie, descends de la table.

translation.en: [in Spanish] Come on! Everybody! Help everybody else!
translation.fr: Allez ! Tout le monde ! Aidez les autres.

translation.en: [in English] I'm so incredibly jazzed about tonight.
translation.fr: Je suis trop content d'être là.

translation.en: Yeah. This is my eighth consecutive Fleekfest.
translation.fr: C'est mon huitième Fleek Fest d'affilée.

translation.en: One year I got sick from nacho cheese, but other than that, I've been to every one.
translation.fr:
Une année, j'ai eu une indigestion,
sinon, je les ai tous faits.

translation.en: That's a lot of people. [scoffs]
I panicked at my karate recital. That was only two people in front of me.
translation.fr:
J'ai paniqué à mon tournoi de karaté.
Il n'y avait que deux personnes.

translation.en: Do you have a charger? My phone just died. Sorry.
translation.fr:
Vous avez un chargeur ?
Mon portable s'est éteint.

translation.en: Do you have a charger? My phone died. I wanna get home.
translation.fr:
Vous avez un chargeur ?
C'est pour rentrer.

translation.en: -You wanna go home? -I wanna go home.
-[laughs] -Now you're home.
What? Why would you do that? Why?
We go on in two minutes, so now's your chance.
translation.fr:
On y va dans deux minutes.
C'est votre moment.

translation.en: Oh, you're so nice.
Now's your chance. [chuckles]
Okay. Please don't make me regret this. Just go.
translation.fr: Ne me faites pas regretter ça. Allez-y.

translation.en: Sorry.
I'm so sorry. Hi, I'm just, um…
I need to find someone, but, um, I… I don't wanna embarrass them.
translation.fr:
Je cherche quelqu'un,
mais je ne veux pas leur faire honte.

translation.en: So if you… if you hear my voice and you belong to me…
translation.fr: Donc si tu entends ma voix et que tu es ma fille…

translation.en: I'm looking for my phone. Sorry, guys.
-Sorry, I'm looking for my phone. -[woman] Watch it!
[man] Yo, what are you doing?
You've got this. [chuckles]
She does not have this. She is not breathing, and she's paralyzed.
translation.fr:
C'est faux.
Elle ne respire pas, elle est paralysée.

translation.en: -I wanna go home. -[man 1] Seriously?
-[man 2] Try and calm down, please? -[man 3] Grow up!
♪ 'Cause, Katie, I love you ♪
Mom!
-Mom! -♪ All your loving ♪
Mom!
Katie!
Thank you. Katie?
Oh, honey.
I am so sorry. [sobbing]
You were right about this place. [sobbing]
You are the best mom.
I'm sorry.
[Allison] Oh, I love you.
Honey. [cries]
We gotta follow that?
I'm scared.
Guys, relax. Just go with it.
translation.fr:
Les gars, détendez-vous.
Suivez le mouvement.

translation.en: I'm really sorry about what I said.
translation.fr: Je regrette ce que j'ai dit.

translation.en: Ugh, don't worry.
Worse has been said to moms.
It's hard to let you grow up. [cries]
translation.fr: C'est dur de te laisser grandir.

translation.en: That's the truth.
It's just hard for moms.
It would've been way more fun to come with you anyway.
translation.fr: Ça aurait été bien plus sympa avec toi.

translation.en: -Really? [laughs] -Yeah.
Well, I… I came anyway.
translation.fr: Eh bien, je suis là, finalement.

translation.en: Oh, my tears. They're gonna make my glitter fall off.
translation.fr:
Mes larmes vont
faire couler mes paillettes.

translation.en: Ugh, I spent about two hours putting this bedazzle on.
translation.fr:
J'ai mis deux heures
à faire ce chef-d'œuvre.

translation.en: Are you guys gonna help me finish this song or what?
translation.fr: Vous allez m'aider à finir cette chanson ?

translation.en: I think she's talking to you, Mom.
-[Allison] No. -H.E.R. is calling you on stage.
-[chuckles] No. -You have to go.
I was talking to both of you.
translation.fr: Je vous parlais à toutes les deux.

translation.en: Get up here.
All of us?
Just them, okay.
Wanna do it?
Yeah, let's do it.
Sing it!
Go, Tasha!
I'm by myself. Okay, cool.
Wolfie, I love you, man!
Yeah, back at you!
Be careful with those beakers. They're going back to school.
translation.fr:
Attention aux béchers.
Ils retournent à l'école.

translation.en: Guys, I told you to take all that stuff out.
translation.fr: Je vous ai dit de sortir tout ça.

translation.en: Take it out, now. All of it.
And just keep, you know, scrubbing.
No slacking off, okay? I see you.
translation.fr: Ne t'arrête pas, je te vois.

translation.en: Whoa, Dad.
You became, like, a scary dad back there.
translation.fr: Tu es devenu effrayant tout à l'heure.

translation.en: Yeah?
Well, I mean, that's…
Sometimes you gotta put your foot down,
translation.fr: Il faut parfois taper du pied,

translation.en: even with the ones you love, like you.
translation.fr: même avec ceux qu'on aime. Comme toi.

translation.en: No, it was pretty cool. I didn't know you actually had it in you.
translation.fr:
Non. C'était cool.
J'ignorais que tu en étais capable.

translation.en: [Carlos] Come here.
-You're still grounded. You know that? -Oh, yeah, super grounded.
translation.fr: Tu es puni. Tu le sais ? Oui, super puni.

translation.en: You got the point. Hey, no slacking off.
translation.fr: Tu as compris. On ne s'arrête pas !

translation.en: The whole thing. The whole thing. The whole column. Go.
translation.fr: En entier. Toute la colonne. Allez.

translation.en: Hey.
[Allison] Hi, honey.
[chuckles] Hey! Oh, baby. I'm so glad you're okay.
translation.fr: Salut. Je suis contente que tu ailles bien.

translation.en: I wanna be a scientist, too, and blow things up.
translation.fr:
Je veux être scientifique
et faire exploser des choses.

translation.en: -[Allison] You want to blow things up? -Yeah.
It looks like you got a lot of practice tonight.
translation.fr:
- Oui.
- Tu as l'air de t'être bien entraînée.

translation.en: Nando, how could you let this happen?
translation.fr: Comment tu as pu laisser faire ça ?

translation.en: You said you'd text if anything went wrong.
translation.fr:
- Tu devais m'écrire si ça tournait mal.
- Toi, comment as-tu pu ?

translation.en: How could you let this happen? You're the oldest, Katie.
translation.fr:
- Tu devais m'écrire si ça tournait mal.
- Toi, comment as-tu pu ? Tu es l'aînée, Katie.

translation.en: Everything they did while you were at that concert is your responsibility too.
translation.fr:
Ce qu'ils ont fait en ton absence
est aussi ta responsabilité.

translation.en: I should ground you for twice as long as Nando.
translation.fr:
Je devrais te punir
deux fois plus longtemps que lui.

translation.en: If it makes you feel better, I was worried sick the whole time.
translation.fr:
Si ça te réconforte,
je me faisais un sang d'encre.

translation.en: Like mother, like daughter, huh?
Now help your brother clean.
It's not so bad being the bad guy. Wow.
translation.fr:
- Ce n'est pas si mal d'être le méchant.
- Waouh.

translation.en: Is it crazy I'm already looking forward to our next Yes Day?
translation.fr:
J'ai envie d'un autre Yes Day,
tu peux le croire ?

translation.en: No, no, no, the day is not over yet. I still have one more thing I wanna do.
translation.fr: Il n'est pas terminé. Je veux encore faire une chose.

translation.en: Hashtag, "Winning."
I cannot believe you stole this gorilla. She didn't steal it. She won it square and fair.
translation.fr:
- Tu as volé ce gorille, j'en reviens pas.
- Non. Elle l'a gagné à la loyale.

translation.en: Square and fair. I did.
-My turn. -[Katie] Thank you, Mom.
-[Carlos] Why can't I get my feet? -[Allison] Carlos, come on.
translation.fr:
- Je ne touche pas.
- Allez, Carlos.

translation.en: -Right on my face. -[laughing]
Nando, why do I feel like you're gonna break my nose?
translation.fr:
Nando, pourquoi j'ai l'impression
que tu vas me casser le nez ?

translation.en: That's the only thing I haven't broken today.
translation.fr:
C'est le seul truc
que je ne me sois pas cassé.

translation.en: -[kisses] -I love you, Mama. I love you, baby.
translation.fr:
- Je t'aime, maman.
- Je t'aime, ma chérie.

translation.en: [Carlos] Nando, are you sure you got rid of all the catalyst?
translation.fr: Nando, tu as jeté tout le catalyseur ?

translation.en: [Nando] Yep. I flushed it down the toilet.
-[Carlos] What? -[Ellie] What's that sound?
translation.fr:
Quoi ? - C'est quoi, ce bruit ?
- La pluie, j'espère.

translation.en: [Allison] I hope that's rain.
translation.fr:
- C'est quoi, ce bruit ?
- La pluie, j'espère.

translation.en: [Ellie] Mama, look! More foam!
-[Nando] Whoops. -[Katie gasps] Oh no!
[Allison and Carlos] Nando!
♪ 'Cause today's gonna be my day ♪ ♪ I just wanna climb ♪
translation.fr:
D'APRÈS LE LIVRE
D'AMY KROUSE ROSENTHAL ET TOM LICHTENHELD

translation.en: -Ah. Ah. -[Nando] Three! -Ow! Ow! -[Nando] Two!
[Nando] One!
Nando, why?
I didn't sign up for this!
They'll never catch me.
I'm like a gazelle!
Yes Day forever!
